duties_responsibilities.duty: Administering, coordinating, and improving activities associated with import, export, inbound and outbound operations to customers and logistics centers.
Generating process orders and delivery pick list from SAP.
Preparing orders and pulling materials for other colleagues to build kits and a la carte.
Coordinating other colleagues to pack and ship orders.
Coordinating finished good inventory and tracking movement of products and materials.
Shipping of products and materials involving customs and documentation.
Making recommendations for new or modified policies, practices, or procedures.
Assisting in receiving of products and materials, including chemicals and other orders.
Updating and writing documentations and standard operating procedures to support daily work.
Working with materials for shipment using dry ice, freezer cold packs, and room temperature items.
Working in a dynamic environment and actively working on feet most of the day, working in a 4C cold room for short periods of time, and lifting/moving items up to 40lbs.
Cross-training in different areas as needed to support.
Conducting other activities as assigned by the manager. May be an informal team lead.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
